Progress pembuatan notebook QIIME2
1. 5 dec - baru sekitar se uprik, sekitar 2/10 sih menurutku
2. 12 dec - udah sampai DADA2 dan Deblur
3. 25 dec - problem di understading sampling depth
4. 10 Jan 21 - baru sampai di alfa dan beta diversity, selanjutnya akan jelasin dikit ttng sampling depth
5. 25 Jan 21 - selesia menulis deskripsi alfa dan beta diversity disertai gambar. gambarnya bisa diedit dulu nnti yakkk,jangan pakai plek gambar yng di copas
6. 27 Jan 21 - maasih dia alfa dan beta diversity, tepatnya di bagian core metrics. mayan lama di baca dan undertanding the sampling depth sih, hehe
7. 30 Jan 21 - udh nyamapai di beta diversity sample in group. udh terlalu malam utnuk edit deskripsi, dan sedikit ngantuk. nggk banyak yang tambahin krna udh nggk fokus, jadi ta stop aja. 

next to do:
1. Tentunya selesaikan deskripsi tiap script atau line
2. perhatikan tiap terminologi yang digunakan, pastikan anda paham dengan sumber terminologi dan jika itu merupakan method, maka harus bisa sedikit disinggung dan diberi link untuk membaca lebih lanjut
3. diakhir, edit narasinya sehingga mudah dipahami
4. kirim ke beberapa teman untuk mengetahui apakah narasinya sudah dapat dipahami atau kurng paham. Bagian mana yang kurang paham disertai masukan jika perlu.

references (format:APA):
(1) https://www.illumina.com/techniques/sequencing/ngs-library-prep/multiplexing.html
(2) Shoemaker, D., Lashkari, D., Morris, D. et al. Quantitative phenotypic analysis of yeast deletion mutants using a highly parallel molecular bar–coding strategy. Nat Genet 14, 450–456 (1996). https://doi.org/10.1038/ng1296-450 
(3) Goodrich, J. K., Rienzi, S. C. Di, Poole, A. C., Koren, O., William, A., Caporaso, J. G., Knight, R., & Ley, R. E. (2016). Conducting a Microbiome Study. HHS Public Access, 158(2), 250–262. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cell.2014.06.037.Conducting
(4) Callahan, B. J., McMurdie, P. J., Rosen, M. J., Han, A. W., Johnson, A. J., & Holmes, S. P. (2016). DADA2: High-resolution sample inference from Illumina amplicon data. Nature methods, 13(7), 581–583. https://doi.org/10.1038/nmeth.3869
(5) Amir, A., Mcdonald, D., Navas-Molina, J. A., Kopylova, E., Morton, J. T., Zech Xu, Z., Kightley, E. P., Thompson, L. R., Hyde, E. R., Gonzalez, A., & Knight, R.. (2017). Deblur Rapidly Resolves Single-Nucleotide Community Sequence Patterns. Msystems, 2(2), e00191–16. https://doi.org/10.1128/msystems.00191-16
(6) Estaki, M., Jiang, L., Bokulich, N. A., Mcdonald, D., González, A., Kosciolek, T., Martino, C., Zhu, Q., Birmingham, A., Vázquez‐Baeza, Y., Dillon, M. R., Bolyen, E., Caporaso, J. G., & Knight, R.. (2020). QIIME 2 Enables Comprehensive End‐to‐End Analysis of Diverse Microbiome Data and Comparative Studies with Publicly Available Data. Current Protocols in Bioinformatics, 70(1). https://doi.org/10.1002/cpbi.100
(7) Krebs, Charles J. 2009. Ecology: The Experimental Analysis of Distribution and Abundance. Pearson Benjamin Cummings, San Fransisco. 
(8) Bynum, Nora, 2021, 67: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma Diversity. (2018, December 26). Biology LibreTexts. https://bio.libretexts.org/Bookshelves/Ecology/Book%3A_Biodiversity_(Bynum)/7%3A_Alpha%2C_Beta%2C_and_Gamma_Diversity
(9) Willis, A. D.. (2019). Rarefaction, Alpha Diversity, and Statistics. Frontiers in Microbiology, 10. https://doi.org/10.3389/fmicb.2019.02407
